key_risk_themes: ["Microservice Integration Complexity","Dependency on External Teams & Services","Operational Readiness & Observability Gaps"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Establish and enforce formal API contracts (OpenAPI, Pact) with Vendor and Payments teams.","Implement robust circuit breakers and fallback mechanisms for all synchronous inter-service calls.","Prioritize the implementation of distributed tracing with mandatory correlation ID propagation."]
